Articles.Content:
So I've been in the process of building my first real rocket to get into orbit and I've hit an odd bug. For some unknown reason the roll is set all the way to the left. Alt+X doesnt work. Using the trim settings will bring it back in-line. This seems to happen anytime SAS is activated, and then de-activated, and only in space... on the ground is fine.

Dunno if this is a bug with KCT and its simulation or not... weird.

looks a bid what I had with rotating rockets.

my question is are the control surfaces facing the backwards. So are they setup for retrograde flying?
